snippet: Max Brand’s solo debut in New York at MoMA PS1 features big, colored drawings that create menageries of renderings, figures and doodles.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews paintings by German artist Max Brand at MoMA PS1.
lead_paragraph: Max Brand’s solo debut in New York at MoMA PS1 features big, colored drawings that create menageries of renderings, figures and doodles.

headline.seo: MAX BRAND: ‘no solid footing — (trained) duck fighting a crow’
headline.main: Max Brand: ‘no solid footing — (trained) duck fighting a crow’
headline.print_headline: Max Brand: ‘no solid footing — (trained) duck fighting a crow’
